ygData.subject: Re: Perhaps the pole IS in a shop somewhere. Lets start  looking...
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know about it being a quest.  I have killed hundreds upon hundreds of Minotaurs, I have killed Meldrath many times, and I have also killed the minotaur
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know about it being a quest. I have killed hundreds upon hundreds of
Minotaurs, I have killed Meldrath many times, and I have also killed the
minotaur guards. Yet my faction with King Akanon isn't warm. It maybe because I
am a necro and there is a certain cap to faction, I really don't know.

Joshua Bednarz wrote:

> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
> . I just think that maybe we are mising somethings, maybe a quest? You
> know, some quests are not given, or even talked about unless you have high
> faction, so maybe if your faction with King Ak'Anon is warmly, he talks to
> you and gives you a quest.

--Eron
aeron@...
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

from The Simpsons: During contract negotiations.

Burns : We don't have to be adversaries Homer, we both want a fair Union
contract...
Homer (To Brain) : Why is Mr. Burns being so nice to me?
Burns: ...and if you scratch my back, I'll scratch yours!
Homer's Brain: Wait a minute, is he coming onto me?
Burns: I mean, if I should slip something into your pocket, what's the harm?
Homer's Brain: Oh my God! He is coming onto me!
Burns: After all, negotiations make strange bed-fellows, [Friendly Laugh]
Homer's Brain: Arggh!
Homer: Sorry Mr. Burns, but I don't go in for these backdoor shenanigans. Sure
I'm flattered, maybe even a little curious, but the answer is no!
